verses.text: In the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* put I my \w trust|strong="H2620"\w*: how \w say|strong="H0559"\w* ye to my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w Flee|strong="H5110"\w* \add as\add* a \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* to your \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*?

For, lo, the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w bend|strong="H1869"\w* \add their\add* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, they make \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* their \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w* upon the \w string|strong="H3499"\w*, that they may \w privily|strong="H0652"\w* \w shoot|strong="H3384"\w* at the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 11.2 \ft privily: Heb. in darkness\f*
If the \w foundations|strong="H8356"\w* be \w destroyed|strong="H2040"\w*, what can the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w*?

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* in his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \add is\add* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w behold|strong="H2372"\w*, his \w eyelids|strong="H6079"\w* \w try|strong="H0974"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w trieth|strong="H0974"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: but the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* and him that \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w*.

Upon the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* he shall \w rain|strong="H4305"\w* \w snares|strong="H6341"\w*, \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* and \w brimstone|strong="H1614"\w*, and an \w horrible|strong="H2152"\w* \w tempest|strong="H7307"\w*: \add this shall be\add* the \w portion|strong="H4521"\w* of their \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*.\f + \fr 11.6 \ft an horrible…: or, a burning tempest\f*

For the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*; his \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* doth \w behold|strong="H2372"\w* the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*.
